meanings.definition: The state of being without sin.
meanings.sent1: Her sinlessnesses brought her inner peace and contentment.
meanings.sent2: The monk's sinlessnesses was admired by all in the monastery.
meanings.sent3: Despite his mischievous nature, his sinlessnesses in following rules was surprising.
meanings.sent4: The purity of her sinlessnesses shone brightly in the darkness of the world.
meanings.sent5: The innocence of the child's sinlessnesses was a beacon of hope for the future.

meanings.definition: The quality of being free from wrongdoing.
meanings.sent1: The sinlessnesses of the charity organization was unquestionable.
meanings.sent2: His sinlessnesses in the matter made him a trustworthy witness.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sinlessnesses in knocking over the vase was met with suspicion.
meanings.sent4: The sinlessnesses of the clear sky after the storm was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The sinlessnesses of the freshly fallen snow covered the landscape in purity.
